title: In try_batch, we should use the latest apply's bucket_meta.
body:
## Description
Now in struct `Apply`, we have `bucket_meta` field. So we should adjust the try_bacth's code to use the latest `bucket_meta` ().

The code have not handled with `bucket_meta` which means we will use the first one's `bucket_meta`.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/71589810/169732567-345561db-2e88-46db-95bf-e16fa4246e49.png)

comments_data.body: Please clarify the issue in the description.
